title: New Quintana Roo V-PR tri bike delivers ready to ride with their new Fit-Ready program
content:
Earlier this month, Quintana Roo snuck in a new triathlon superbike. The V-PR features a completely new design that drops a bunch of weight while improving on aerodynamics, range of fit, and how the bike is delivered. While it’s an optional program, Quintana Roo’s new Fit-Ready program means you can get a tri bike delivered

The post New Quintana Roo V-PR tri bike delivers ready to ride with their new Fit-Ready program appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
